show_name: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts OVA
other_title: Baka to Test to Shōkanjū: Matsuri (Japanese)
バカとテストと召喚獣 ～祭～ (Japanese)
plot: Continuing where season 1 left off, everyone in Class F is bemoaning the horrible equipment they have. There is a school festival going on though, and if they make enough money they'll be able to buy better school supplies, and as always Akihisa is ready to do anything that might help out Himeji. This is especially important though, because Himeji's father is worried about her placement in Class F and is thinking about transferring her to another school.
opening_theme: "Renai Kōjō Committee" (恋愛向上committee) by Natsuko Aso
ending_theme: "Getsuyō wa Kirai" (月曜はキライ) by milktub
